name: Bravo Sample: Charts
description:
Made for Bravo Studio.


Add native chart components in your Bravo app with this sample Figma file.

The file includes layers named with Bravo Tags, containers, and other essential setup. 🤓


To see the final result, go to Bravo Studio, go to the Sample Apps section and duplicate this app. The duplicated app will include a connected API collection and data binding with content from an Airtable. 🚀


Learn more about setting up charts in the Bravo Studio help center.


Check out Bravo Studio 👏

www.bravostudio.app
